SEARCH
Package board.tiles.property

Class Station

java.lang.Object
board.tiles.general.Tile
board.tiles.property.Property
board.tiles.property.Station
public class Station extends Property
Represents a Station tile on the board. Stations can be purchased, and rent is dynamically calculated based on how many stations the owner holds. If a player owns multiple stations, they can travel between them.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Station

      public Station(String name)
      Constructs a Station with the given name. All stations have a fixed price of $200 and base rent of $25.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the station

  • Method Details

    • tileAction

      public void tileAction(Player player)
      Handles the action when a player lands on this station. - If unowned: player is prompted to purchase. - If owned by another player: rent is paid based on number of stations owned. - If owned by the current player and they own multiple stations: they are offered to travel.
      Overrides:
      tileAction in class Property
      Parameters:
      player - the player who landed on the tile
